about_the_game:
Evil reigns in the world, most of the human kingdoms are enslaved by the forces of darkness, and those that remain are defending with their last strength. People make up legends about ancient artifacts called "Onems". It is said that if you collect them all, then you can gain complete control over the forces of darkness. There are rumors that this is just a fairy tale to calm people down. The witch Erika will have to find the missing sisters and face difficulties face to face.
 A classic action RPG with IDLE elements. You will have to defeat many monsters, grow plants, collect various items and practice potions. You are free to go where you want and do what you want, the game has a semi-open world system, so you are not limited in actions. In addition to all of the above, there is a huge amount of sexual content and profanity in the game, so this game is not suitable for people with a weak mentality! 18+

content_descriptors.notes:
Violence & blood, rape scenes, BDSM, bestiality, Insects, dismemberment, light body horror, pregnancy scenes
alcohol and tobacco, aphrodisiac, unrealistic exaggerations,
public nudity, prostitution

The game contains scenes of violence against the main character, but due to her character, she does not receive psychological trauma because of this. The main character also cannot die, because according to the plot she is immortal. The game contains scenes of prostitution, light body horror, hints of alcohol, tobacco and drug use. The game does not indicate what drinks and tobacco the characters use, there is only a visual demonstration. There is also no mention of real drugs, the game demonstrates an aphrodisiac. The game contains murder scenes, but the main character does not really die and wakes up from sleep after deadly scene. The game contains many scenes of a sexual nature.

detailed_description:
Evil reigns in the world, most of the human kingdoms are enslaved by the forces of darkness, and those that remain are defending with their last strength. People make up legends about ancient artifacts called "Onems". It is said that if you collect them all, then you can gain complete control over the forces of darkness. There are rumors that this is just a fairy tale to calm people down. The witch Erika will have to find the missing sisters and face difficulties face to face.
 A classic action RPG with IDLE elements. You will have to defeat many monsters, grow plants, collect various items and practice potions. You are free to go where you want and do what you want, the game has a semi-open world system, so you are not limited in actions. In addition to all of the above, there is a huge amount of sexual content and profanity in the game, so this game is not suitable for people with a weak mentality! 18+
name: Abyss Of Pleasure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720/1280x768 or better Display.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10/11
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720/1280x768 or better Display.

short_description: The story is about the adventures of the witch Erika in a world filled with monsters. Erika will have to find her sisters and deal with all the obstacles along the way!
